Question 43.Question: Why didnâ€™t you use GenAI for feedback on your work?
Question 43.Response:
I am hesitant to put my intellectual property into GenAI and have it take it or appropriate it without my permission. I do not want university plagiarism checkers to think that I plagiarised or used GenAI to create an assignment just because the tool appropriates my own intellectual property. 

I do not trust its ability to find accurate sources, to be not biased, to be completely reliable.
